trans-unit.source: Contains the raw data for a counter.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder raw-data for en teller.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSetInstanceCounterDataSet.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property returns an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSetInstanceCounterDataSet.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Returnerer en forekomst av denne klassen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSetInstanceCounterDataSet.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This class provides thread-safe methods for reading and writing counter data.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen gir sikker metoder for å lese og skrive tellerdata.

trans-unit.source: Decrements the counter value by 1.
trans-unit.target: Reduseres telleren verdi av 1.

trans-unit.source: This method safely decrements the counter value for multi-threaded applications.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden trygt reduseres telleren verdi med flere tråder programmer.

trans-unit.source: To decrement the counter value by a specific value, call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.IncrementBy%2A> method and set the `value` parameter to a negative number.
trans-unit.target: For å redusere tellerverdien med en bestemt verdi, kan du kalle den <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.IncrementBy%2A>metoden og angitt av `value` parameter til et negativt tall.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.IncrementBy%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the counter value, use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi verdien for counter, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Value%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Increments the counter value by 1.
trans-unit.target: Utvider tellerverdien etter 1.

trans-unit.source: This method safely increments the counter value for multi-threaded applications.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden øker trygt tellerverdien for flere tråder programmer.

trans-unit.source: To set the counter value, use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi verdien for counter, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Value%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: To increment the counter value by a specific value, call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.IncrementBy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil øke tellerverdien med en bestemt verdi, kan du kalle den <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.IncrementBy%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.IncrementBy%2A>

trans-unit.source: Increments the counter value by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: Utvider tellerverdien etter angitt antall.

trans-unit.source: This method safely increments the counter value for multi-threaded applications.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden øker trygt tellerverdien for flere tråder programmer.

trans-unit.source: To set the counter value, use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi verdien for counter, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Value%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: To increment the counter value by 1, call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Increment%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil øke tellerverdien 1, kan du kalle den <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Increment%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Increment%2A>

trans-unit.source: The amount by which to increment the counter value.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som skal økes tellerverdien.

trans-unit.source: The increment value can be positive or negative.
trans-unit.target: Økningsverdien for kan være positiv eller negativ.

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets the raw counter data.
trans-unit.target: Angir eller henter raw tellerdata.

trans-unit.source: This property is not thread safe and is appropriate only for single-threaded access.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er ikke trygt tråd og gjelder bare for enkelttrådet tilgang.

trans-unit.source: For multi-threaded access to the counter data, use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For flere tråder tilgang til tellerdata, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Value%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The raw counter data.
trans-unit.target: Raw tellerdata.

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets the counter data.
trans-unit.target: Angir eller henter tellerdata.

trans-unit.source: This property provides safe access to the counter data for multi-threaded applications.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gir sikker tilgang til tellerdata for flere tråder programmer.

trans-unit.source: If performance is of primary concern, use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.RawValue%2A> property; however, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.RawValue%2A> property is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ytelse på spørsmål, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.RawValue%2A>egenskapen; imidlertid den <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.RawValue%2A>egenskapen er ikke trygt tråd.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.RawValue%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.RawValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the Value property is not thread safe in .NET Framework 3.5.
trans-unit.target: Merk at egenskapen Value ikke er trygt i .NET Framework 3.5 tråd.

trans-unit.source: To increment the counter value, consider using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Increment%2A> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.IncrementBy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil øke tellerverdien, bør du bruke den <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Increment%2A>eller <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.IncrementBy%2A>metode.</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.IncrementBy%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterData.Increment%2A>

trans-unit.source: The counter data.
trans-unit.target: Tellerdata.
